Name: Shrine II
About the game: Shrine II is a first person shooter made in the Doom engine! Battle the nightmarish eldritch horde as Tusk, the skinless monstrosity! Annihilate a variety of horrific enemies with a load of unique and strange weapons. Travel through a variety of levels set in a retro Gothic Lovecraftian world! Over 20 Weapons to rampage your way through the Elder World! 30 Enemies to Blast into giblets! 6 Challenging bosses to defeat! Secrets around every corner! 32 challenging but fair levels to test your might against the eldritch Horde! A thank you to Jberg for the standalone version!
